# Problem 2

```{r}

(recreate.grob <- V_Dem.df %>%
  dplyr::filter(country_name == "Argentina" |
                  country_name == "Brazil") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = v2x_polyarchy) ) +
  geom_line(aes(color = country_name) ) +
  labs (x = "Year", y = "Polyarchy", "Democracy Level",
        title = "Democracy Levels") +
  theme_classic()  +
    theme(legend.title = element_blank(),
          legend.position = c(.1, 0.9),
          plot.title = element_text(face = "bold")) +
    scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, .8, .2) ) +
    scale_color_manual(values = c("Argentina" = "Red",
                                  "Brazil" = "Blue") )
  )

  
```
